duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate with stakeholders for various test campaigns to ensure clear alignment on goals and outcomes.
Plan, schedule, and execute test campaigns.
Design, build and maintain test racks. Ensure racks are properly calibrated.
Work together with test automation development to ensure test plan coverage is complete.
Manage and track test samples to ensure they are properly prepared and ready for test.
Support debug of hardware when necessary. Assess any failures and determine next steps.
Compile and disseminate test reports, ensuring data is valid, accurate, and clear.
Work with outside labs when necessary for executing testing.

education_certification.credential: Associates or bachelor degree for RF engineering or equivalent experience.
Previous experience with a variety of test campaigns such as FCC, ETSI, SMC-016, etc.
Good understanding of radio systems and RF fundamentals.
